channel.title: Howdy, I'm Ryan Glover from Proper
channel.description:
Howdy, Ryan Glover here. I'm currently working on [my first SaaS product, Proper][1]. It allows freelancers, consultants, and small teams to prepare, send, and get contracts signed.
I also run a small design studio (bootstrapped out of my house!) called [Well Rounded Gent][3].
Excited to meet others working on their own products and learn a lot about running a software business on your own coin. Looks like a cool spot :smile:
– Ryan
[1]: http://properapp.com [2]: http://whatwhenapp.com [3]: http://wellroundedgent.com

item.title: Howdy, I'm Ryan Glover from Proper
item.dc:creator: rglover
item.description:
Eventually, yes. Once I get everything up and running I’m going to try to find someone who can help me with that part. Not exactly sure where to start, but definitely on my roadmap.

Read full topic

item.title: Howdy, I'm Ryan Glover from Proper
item.dc:creator: andrey
item.description:
Hi Ryan. Welcome to the forums. Good luck with Proper; it sounds like it might be a useful product to many of the folks on here as well.
